data.text:
What a great experience that was! The course provided a deep dive into the challenges and innovations shaping Urban Logistics, and I incorporated this knowledge into the logistics programs I lead.

IN THEIR WORDS. We have closed registrations for our International Summer University Program. Here is what our students have to say about their experience with our last Winter University Program at @hochschule.offenburg üè´ Hear from our student, @Yogananda Shrihari Prasad from @bitspilaniofficial, as he shares about his time in Germany and his learnings! ‚úÖ Stay tuned for updates on our International Winter University Program 2025! #dadb #studentfeedback #summeruniversityprogram #germany #germanengineering #creatingchances

With the autumn term just around the corner, now's the perfect time to explore what studying at INTO University of Stirling is all about. From the unwavering support of our dedicated teachers to the comprehensive services offered by our Student Service team, we ensure you have everything you need for a successful academic journey. Curious to hear more? Check out the video where our former student, Taku, shares his experience during his time at INTO Stirling. Discover what awaits you this coming term! #INTOStirling #AutumnTerm

Explore the University of Maastricht like never before! Using our platform the University of Maastricht has created a cutting-edge interactive campus tour video. Immerse yourself in the vibrant campus atmosphere, navigate through key facilities, and engage with personalized insights about programs. Watch the immersive video here https://lnkd.in/eHgTf67 #UniversityOfMaastricht #InteractiveCampusTour #InnovativeEducation #interactivevideo

Exciting news! Our student has been accepted to Ulster University in the UK! üåçüéì We couldn't be prouder of their achievement and can't wait to see all the amazing things they will accomplish. If you're dreaming of studying in the UK, consult with us to make your admission process smooth and successful. Your future starts here! #theias #freeconsultation #internationalacademicsolutions #theiasconsultants #studyabroad #theiAS #consultation #iAS

The Emotional Intelligence Academy will be joining forces with MMU to share how the MSc in #emotionalintelligence and #behaviouranalysis provides a pathway into frontline professional settings where our past students are making a real difference - in leadership roles, in business, social work, relationships, and in life and death contexts such as #military #intelligence #lawenforcement https://lnkd.in/gtteqD2C
